scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npx lerna clean -y && rm -Rf node_modules # remove all node_modules
scripts.clean-dist: npx lerna exec --no-bail 'npm run --if-present clean || rm -rf dist *.tsbuildinfo || true' # remove built files
scripts.clean-package-locks: rm -f package-lock.json && npx lerna exec --no-bail 'rm -f package-lock.json' # remove all package-lock files. npm run clean & npm run bootstrap to fully regenerate.
